options.content: # PURE STORAGE ## Overview This dashboard provides performance and capacity details for Pure Storage FlashBlades. Group arrays by customer defined environment, whole fleets, or view arrays individually.

## Metrics

`All metrics are prefixed with purefb_`

Below are the metrics names available:

### Collected with endpoint /metrics/array

    * info
    * alerts_open
    * hardware_health
    * array_http_specific_performance_latency_usec
    * array_http_specific_performance_throughput_iops
    * array_nfs_latency_usec
    * array_nfs_throughput_iops
    * array_performance_average_bytes
    * array_performance_bandwidth_bytes
    * array_performance_latency_usec
    * array_performance_throughput_iops
    * array_s3_specific_performance_latency_usec
    * array_s3_specific_performance_throughput_iops
    * array_space_bytes
    * array_space_data_reduction_ratio
    * array_space_parity
    * bucket_replica_links_lag_msec
    * buckets_performance_average_bytes
    * buckets_performance_bandwidth_bytes
    * buckets_performance_latency_usec
    * buckets_performance_throughput_iops
    * buckets_s3_specific_performance_latency_usec
    * buckets_s3_specific_performance_throughput_iops
    * buckets_space_bytes
    * buckets_space_data_reduction_ratio
    * buckets_space_objects
    * file_system_links_lag_msec
    * file_systems_performance_average_bytes
    * file_systems_performance_bandwidth_bytes
    * file_systems_performance_latency_usec
    * file_systems_performance_throughput_iops
    * file_systems_space_bytes
    * file_systems_space_data_reduction_ratio
    * hardware_connectors_performance_bandwidth_bytes
    * hardware_connectors_performance_errors
    * hardware_connectors_performance_throughput_pkts

### Collected with endpoint /metrics/usage
    * file_system_usage_groups_bytes
    * file_system_usage_users_bytes
    
### Collected with endpoint /metrics/clients
Collecting client performance information may require increasing scrape collection it is therefore recommended as an optional configuration item.
 
    * array_clients_performance_avg_size_bytes
    * array_clients_performance_bandwidth_bytes
    * array_clients_performance_latency_usec
    * array_clients_performance_throughput_iops

panels.title: Total Array Space Utilization by Type and $instance arrays(s)
Average IOPS by IO Type and $instance arrays(s)

targets.expr:
avg(purefb_file_systems_performance_bandwidth_bytes{env=~"$env", instance=~"$instance"}) by (name,instance, dimension)
and
topk($TopItems, avg(rate(purefb_file_systems_performance_bandwidth_bytes{env=~"$env", instance=~"$instance"}[$__range] @ end() )) by (name,instance, dimension))

panels.title: Average Top $TopItems Filesystems Throughput by Name

targets.expr:
avg(purefb_file_systems_performance_latency_usec{env=~"$env", instance=~"$instance"}) by (name,dimension,instance)
and
topk($TopItems, avg(rate(purefb_file_systems_performance_latency_usec{env=~"$env", instance=~"$instance"}[$__range] @ end() )) by (name,dimension,instance))

panels.title: Average Top $TopItems File System Latency by Name & IO Type

targets.expr:
avg(purefb_buckets_performance_bandwidth_bytes{env=~"$env", instance=~"$instance"}) by (name,instance,dimension)
and
topk($TopItems, avg(rate(purefb_buckets_performance_bandwidth_bytes{env=~"$env", instance=~"$instance"}[$__range] @ end() )) by (name,instance,dimension))

panels.title: Average Top $TopItems Buckets Throughput $instance arrays(s) by Name

targets.expr:
avg(purefb_buckets_performance_latency_usec{env=~"$env", instance=~"$instance"}) by (name,dimension,instance)
and
topk($TopItems, avg(rate(purefb_buckets_performance_latency_usec{env=~"$env", instance=~"$instance"}[$__range] @ end() )) by (name,dimension,instance))

panels.title: Average Top $TopItems Latent Buckets $instance arrays(s) by Type
